name: Urdu InPage Document
summary: Learn about .INP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Urdu InPage is a Windows program that allows users to create text documents in many different languages. Primarily, users use InPage to create documents written in Urdu.
NOTE: While a "Mac" version of InPage exists, it can be run only using the CrossOver Mac application, which allows Mac users to run Windows applications on their Mac.

description: An INP file is a text document created by Urdu InPage, a multilingual publishing application for the Urdu, Arabic, Persian, and English languages. It contains text saved in the Noorinastaliq font, which displays Urdu in nastaliq script. The INP format also supports standard page formatting.

instructions: You can open an INP file in Concept Software Urdu InPage (Windows). There are no other known programs that can open INP files.
You can use Urdu InPage to convert INP files to the .PDF format. To do so, open your INP file in InPage, then select File â†’ Save as PDF.

images.caption: INP file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.76
